channel.title: Hi, I'm Alex Ford
channel.description:
Hello! I'm a front end (dabbling in backend, especially PHP) developer, and designer (my "formal" education is in graphic design).
My current little product is http://mock.ly —a tool for designers to easily share (finished) web mockups with their clients and get feedback in the browser. I'm currently working on the landing page to increase conversions (not good now) and plan to post a teardown request soon.
I am hoping to get a few more bootstrapped products going with my business partner over the next few months, as well.
Looking forward to the discussions!
-Alex

item.title: Hi, I'm Alex Ford

item.description:
Great to see you here Alex. Columbus represent!

item.title: Hi, I'm Alex Ford
item.dc:creator: alexford
item.description:
Hello! I’m a front end (dabbling in backend, especially PHP) developer, and designer (my “formal” education is in graphic design).

My current little product is http://mock.ly —a tool for designers to easily share (finished) web mockups with their clients and get feedback in the browser. I’m currently working on the landing page to increase conversions (not good now) and plan to post a teardown request soon.

I am hoping to get a few more bootstrapped products going with my business partner over the next few months, as well.

Looking forward to the discussions!

-Alex
